Program Listing for File fmath.h
================================

|exhale_lsh| :ref:`Return to documentation for file <file_src_fmath.h>` (``src\fmath.h``)

.. |exhale_lsh| unicode:: U+021B0 .. UPWARDS ARROW WITH TIP LEFTWARDS

.. code-block:: cpp

   
   
   #pragma once
   #include <corecrt_math_defines.h>
   
   namespace prism {
       namespace math {
   
           float degToRad(float degrees);
   
       } // namespace math
   } // namespace prism
